name: Fibix
description:
The Game is meant to be played with a gamepad

Left Stick = Move

A = Dash

B = Parry

Y = Shoot

X = Melee

RT = Neutron Bomb

Goal

Your main goal is to make the biggest score. For this you need to kill ennemies without beeing killed. You die if you are hitted 3 time.

Abilities

Your abilities have durability. If you use them 5 times they will break. The ennemies will loot their own abilities. Catch those loots to fix your broken abilities.

The Neutron Bomb is really powerfull but will break all your abilities, so be carefull.
